features.name: Hero Section with 3D Avatar
features.description: Animated hero section featuring a 3D holographic torus knot avatar using Three.js WebGL, with responsive design and fallback UI for mobile devices. Includes WebGL context management to prevent mobile rendering issues.

features.name: Mobile WebGL Context Management
features.description: Smart WebGL context tracking and limiting system (max 6 contexts on mobile) to prevent white canvas issues on mobile devices. Includes automatic cleanup and graceful fallback to HTML/CSS when WebGL unavailable.

features.name: 3D Skill Orbs
features.description: Interactive 3D skill visualization using icosahedron geometry with orbiting tech logo billboards. Features synchronized rotation, texture loading with timeouts, and HTML fallback UI when WebGL context limit is reached.

features.name: LeetCode Statistics Integration
features.description: Real-time LeetCode profile statistics fetched from official GraphQL API with count-up animations, donut progress chart, and difficulty breakdown (Easy/Medium/Hard). Uses SWR for client-side data fetching with caching.

features.name: Count-Up Number Animations
features.description: Smooth number count-up animations with easing for LeetCode stats display, animating from previous values to new values on data updates.

features.name: Lazy Loading Sections
features.description: Performance optimization using IntersectionObserver to lazy-load sections only when scrolled into viewport. Features configurable threshold, rootMargin, fade-in animations, and optional placeholders.

features.name: Navigation Bar
features.description: Sticky navigation header with smooth scroll-to-section functionality and responsive design.

features.name: Project Showcase
features.description: Portfolio project cards with images, descriptions, tech stack tags, and links to live demos and GitHub repositories.

features.name: Experience Timeline
features.description: Professional experience timeline component displaying work history, roles, companies, and achievements in chronological order.

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: Contact form with validation using React Hook Form and Zod schema validation. Includes name, email, and message fields.

features.name: Responsive Design System
features.description: Mobile-first responsive design with Tailwind CSS, supporting viewports from 320px to 2560px. Includes breakpoints for mobile, tablet, and desktop layouts.

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Comprehensive UI component library built with Radix UI primitives and styled with Tailwind CSS. Includes buttons, cards, progress bars, tooltips, dialogs, forms, and more.

features.name: Section Headers
features.description: Reusable section header component with icon support and consistent styling across all portfolio sections.

features.name: Particle Background
features.description: Animated 3D particle field background using Three.js point clouds for visual depth and atmosphere.

features.name: Texture Loading with Fallbacks
features.description: Advanced texture loading system for 3D logo billboards with 3-second timeout, mobile-optimized filtering (no mipmaps), proper memory cleanup, and HTML img fallback for failed loads.

features.name: API Route - LeetCode Proxy
features.description: Server-side API route that proxies requests to LeetCode GraphQL API, normalizes response data, and implements 1-hour server-side caching for performance.

features.name: Portfolio Data Management
features.description: Centralized portfolio data configuration including personal info, skills, projects, experience, and social links.

features.name: Gradient & Neon Effects
features.description: Custom gradient backgrounds, neon glow effects, and blur overlays for modern cyberpunk aesthetic using Tailwind CSS utilities.
